title: Uncle Si's New Panther-Catching Device
description:
Si is pumped about a clever new plan to put the panther debate to rest. He also talks about his new workout regimen, the time he performed at the Grand Ole Opry, his 300-yard golf drive, Phil’s ‘photostatic memory,’ and why America is still the greatest country in the world. Stone remembers the first time he and Phillip met. Si is writing a gospel song, and he's pretty sure he has a #1 hit on his hands. Godwin offers up bull-riding advice. And the boys recall their craziest stories about boat breakdowns.
-
